options.content:
### Metrics

For more information on metrics exposed in this dashboard please visit [here](https://docs.kubecost.com/architecture/user-metrics)

targets.expr: sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 24)
sum(node_total_hourly_cost)
sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 720)

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
1 - (
  avg(sum(node_total_hourly_cost))
/
  avg_over_time(
    sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [1d:1h]
  )
)
targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 1d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr: stdvar_over_time( sum(node_total_hourly_cost) by (instance_type) [7d:1d] ) > 0

panels.title: Standard Variation of Cost by InstanceType (7d/1d)

targets.expr:
topk( 20, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost {pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost {pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	) * 730) by (namespace)
)

topk( 20, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{pod=~"$pod"}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (container)
)

topk( 20, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{pod=~"$pod"}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (pod)
)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,namespace,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace

  +

		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace, container)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace)

topk( 20, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container, instance, namespace, pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

					label_replace

  +

)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()

  +

		  			) * 0

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace

  +

		  			label_replace

		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) * 720

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"

			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) * 24 * 7

topk( 20, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace

  +

		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0

)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"

  +

matcher.options: Relative price now vs 14d ago (Hour Price)
Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
1 - (

avg_over_time(

  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace, container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace) [1d:1h]
            )
            
            /
            
avg_over_time(

  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace) [7d:1h]
            )
            )
targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

1 - (

				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"

			)
  +

avg_over_time(

  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 14d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Relative price now vs (7/14)d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
topk( 30, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (container)
)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	))

sum(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (container))

(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	))) * 24

matcher.options: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	))) * 24 * 30

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container,pod) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{pod=~"$pod"} + on(node,instance_type,pod) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (container)
sum(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * 24 * 100

panels.title: Kubernetes EBS alocation price by day
